name: Appetizers
description: Start off with one of our delicious appetizers, sure to pique your appetite.

items.title: Chips con Salsa
items.description: Chips con Salsa An unlimited supply of our lightly salted chips with our homemade salsa made just how you like it.

items.title: Chips con Guacamole
items.description: Chips con Guacamole Our delicious corn chips made fresh daily and served with our delicious guacamole topped with pico de gallo.

items.title: Sopa de Camarones
items.description: Sopa de Camarones A tomato based broth with large shrimp and our special sofrito vegetable marinade.

items.title: Sopa de Gallina
items.description: Sopa de Gallina Shredded chicken with our mix of spices and tomatos, peppers and cilantro.

name: Entrees
description: Our entrees feature grass-fed beef and locally grown vegetables...the fresh ingredients sing all the way down to your stomach.

items.title: Burron Gigante
items.description: Burron Gigante One serious pound of beef or chicken, plus beans, rice and pico de gallo. Topped with melted white cheddar cheese.

items.title: Steak del Border
items.description: Steak del Border Our delicious grilled steak cooked to perfection with our secret blend of spices .

items.title: Flautas
items.description: Flautas Your choice of flour with your choice of beef, chicken or vegan fillings.

items.title: Taquitos
items.description: Taquitos Corn tortillas rolled up in our secret green salsa and rolled up into amazing bites of wonder.

name: Sides
description: Customize you meal with with your choice from our delicious side dishes.

items.title: Ensalada Mex
items.description: Ensalada Mex Crisp, fresh lettuce with pico de gallo and a side of guacamoleâ€¦plus a dollop of sour cream.

items.title: Tortillas Solas
items.description: Tortillas Solas Our tortillas are made fresh to order and are guaranteed to reach your table hot.

items.title: Arroz con Tortillas
items.description: Arroz con Tortillas Double down with a serving of our yellow rice plus our made to order tortillas.
